diff.replace: not $shoppinglist.indexof.{$tradewares.{$i}} and $warebasket.indexof.{$tradewares.{$i}} and $homebase.cargo.{$tempware}.target gt $homebase.cargo.{$tempware}.count and ($homebase.cargo.{$tempware}.target - $homebase.cargo.{$tempware}.count) gt ($homebase.cargo.{$tempware}.target * 0.1f)
if $homebase.resources.list.count then $homebase.resources.list else if $homebase.tradewares.list.count then $homebase.tradewares.list else $homebase.resources.list
